content.text: Welcome to my small humble website. My real name is Paul C. B!!N!!uuml;tow and I am a full time Linux System Administrator managing a few servers at work (in a team). In my spare time I drive buetow.org and also spend my time in system programming tasks.
If you don't like this website design: I am not a web designer and sometimes less is more.
